name: Big Spook
description:
Big Spook

A (small) Horror Project made within 2/3 weeks for October. It's called Big Spook because I don't want the title to spoil the game (or I might just be bad at titles).

The playtime is 25 minutes so it can be played quickly at any time.

The game contains many different environments and might have some creepy creatures running around.

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/hUbzJCDXD2

Controls

  • Move: WASD
  • Sprint: Left Shift
  • Interact: F
  • Drop Left: LMB
  • Drop Right: RMB
